Reviews.Author: BackToTheFuture
Reviews.Content: The tablet is pretty good, but there are flaws. For the price, it has a cheap terrible camera, and it doesn't have hdmi either. So for $500 your really not getting anything better than the nexus 7 tablet which costs about half what this costs. The price of this doesn't make any sense, especially when the 10.1 model goes for $349.
Reviews.Title: Not worth the price

Reviews.Author: Fernando Diaz
Reviews.Content: **UPDATE** THIS TABLET IS DISCONTINUED..MEANING NO FUTURE SUPPORT..THANKS TO-SHIT-BAD...FOR SCREWING YOUR CUSTOMERSToshiba has broken the Android Open platfom policy. If I want to root and void my warranty, then its my decision not them. Toshiba will not support rooting your device, meaning you will not be able to unlock the bootloader and root it..This is a very bad decision on them..This tablet will die in a few months...I was about to get it until I read this...BAD BAD DECISION.
Reviews.Title: Warning:Toshiba will not unlock the bootloader..
